reviews.review: Multiplayer is super fun, with or without a friend, and I love the story and gameplay, the physics have been super improved from the 1st game, so, in other words, it's fucking lit bro.
epic nuff said multiplayer or story both perfect

Like this game is good. Great level design that legit made me think. I don't usually do that. The co-op is fun with anyone. It has a great mix of puzzles and just messing around with friends. I'm the best at dunks I swear. The only problem I had with this game is... their's no sequel!
The concept is pretty cool! also i love challenge games.

What do glados and hitler have in common? They both like gassing people :)

Portal 2 does everything the original game did and made them even better. Everything from the mechanics, puzzles, and characters have been revamped. The story that you experience is engaging and immersive and adds on to the original story concepts of Portal. The whimsical and sometimes dark humor is still present in this game. Absolutely worth the price and more when the bundle goes on sale.
哈哈哈很有意思的游戏，适合联机

Absolutely love this game. It created a great story line that flowed right from the first one. The game play is smooth and the graphics are amazing to look at. Controls are easy to grasp but the major appeal is the satisfaction you get from solving a difficult puzzle.
it's pretty poggers, made me say wow, cool beans
Muito bom, aprofunda muito a história da Aperture e os desafios são ainda melhores que os do primeiro jogo.

Não são apenas puzzles muito bons (embora hajam puzzles até demais) que fazem de Portal 2 um ótimo jogo. Não é sobre técnica dos jogadores e/ou níveis de dificuldade para alcançar achievements... ao menos durante o single player mode, Portal 2 foi um jogo para ouvir e acompanhar GLaDOS e Wheatley, historias, reclamações senso cômico. No mundo de Portal 2 onde a produção e busca por resultados  está acima de qualquer sentido de moralidade humana, a historia de exploração é contada de maneira sutil e cômica. Um ótimo jogo. Ansioso para jogar no modo Co-op.

If you haven't played this game, I- I don't know what's wrong with you. Just get the game. It's only $10 when it's not on sale. Just try it, and I guarantee you'll like it. I'm very picky with my games, and this is literally the most amazing game I have ever experienced.
No hay razón para no jugarlo, menos para no recomendarlo. Te vas a divertir como en ningún juego.

Segundo jogo da série de Portal. Não é necessário jogar o primeiro para jogar esse, mas como o outro é bem curto, recomendo jogar pra poder ligar as pontas. Gameplays em geral é a mesma, porém a história é ainda mais profunda (em uma parte do jogo, é literalmente profunda kkkkk) e ainda tem um modo coop para jogar com os amigos.
便宜 好玩 多人
Jedna z najlepszych gier jakich wyszły. Genialna fabuła, grafika jak na grę z 2011 roku wyśmienita... Do tego jeszcze multik i możliwość tworzenia własnych poziomów. Miód malina! :D

its good you need to have a little patience and a little brain power

Je dois vous avouer que c'est l'un des seuls jeux qui est sans défaut, selon moi. Ce jeu est juste invroyable. Le 1 est, je dirai, pas nul mais c'est pas le meilleur jeu non plus ! Il évident que les deux jeux n'ont aucun rapport entre eux à pars les mécaniques, on va dire que le 1 était juste un test pour être grossier !  
Seul ou à plusieurs vous pourrez avoir un expérience plutôt pas mal avec des salles plus ou moins compliqué ! Une histoire qui suit les personnages tout le long, le jeux pourra être simple au début puis devenir un enfer à la fin en connaissance de cause.
Bref en résumé acheter ce jeu immédiatement ! N'hésitez pas. ALLEZ-Y !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Science isn't about WHY. It's about WHY NOT. Why is so much of our science dangerous? Why not marry safe science if you love it so much. In fact, why not invent a special safety door that won't hit you on the butt on the way out, because you are fired.Not you, test subject, you're doing fine. Yes, you. Box. Your stuff. Out the front door. Parking lot. Car. Goodbye.
 -Cave Johnson
